TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImageAnimator extends System.Object

summary.span: 顯示具有以時間為基礎的框架 (Frame) 的影像動畫。

span.span: Animates an image that has time-based frames.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Animate (System.Drawing.Image image, EventHandler onFrameChangedHandler);
.method public static hidebysig void Animate(class System.Drawing.Image image, class System.EventHandler onFrameChangedHandler) cil managed
public: static void Animate(System::Drawing::Image ^ image, EventHandler ^ onFrameChangedHandler);

param.name: image
param.span: 要顯示動畫的 物件。

param.name: onFrameChangedHandler
param.span: 物件，指定當動畫框架變更時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: An object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.

summary.span: 顯示多重框架影像為動畫。

span.span: Displays a multiple-frame image as an animation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個 Windows Form 應用程式示範如何以動畫的影像繪製至螢幕。This Windows Forms application demonstrates how to draw an animated image to the screen. 從 SampleAnimation.gif 位於與應用程式相同的資料夾中的動畫 GIF 檔案建立映像。The image is created from the animated GIF file SampleAnimation.gif located in the same folder as the application. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImageAnimator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool CanAnimate(class System.Drawing.Image image) cil managed

summary.span: 傳回布林值 (Boolean)，表示指定的影像是否包含以時間為基礎的框架。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified image contains time-based frames.

returns.span: 如果指定的影像包含以時間為基礎的框架，則這個方法會傳回 ；否則傳回 。

span.span: This method returns if the specified image contains time-based frames; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StopAnimate (System.Drawing.Image image, EventHandler onFrameChangedHandler);
.method public static hidebysig void StopAnimate(class System.Drawing.Image image, class System.EventHandler onFrameChangedHandler) cil managed
public: static void StopAnimate(System::Drawing::Image ^ image, EventHandler ^ onFrameChangedHandler);

param.name: image
param.span: 要停止顯示動畫的 物件。

param.name: onFrameChangedHandler
param.span: 物件，指定當動畫框架變更時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: An object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UpdateFrames() cil managed

summary.span: 在目前正在建立動畫的所有影像中，將此畫面格向前移。

span.span: Advances the frame in all images currently being animated.

summary.span: 新的畫面格會在下次呈現影像時繪製。

span.span: The new frame is drawn the next time the image is rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UpdateFrames(class System.Drawing.Image image) cil managed

param.name: image
param.span: 用來更新框架的 物件。

span.span: The object for which to update frames.

summary.span: 在指定的影像中將畫面格往前移。

span.span: Advances the frame in the specified image.

summary.span: 新的畫面格在下一次呈現影像時繪製。

span.span: The new frame is drawn the next time the image is rendered.

summary.span: 這個方法僅適用於以時間為基礎的畫面格之影像。

span.span: This method applies only to images with time-based frames.
